sentences: Ma olen tegelenud eesti keelega kolm aastat.
Ta on praegu tegelenud uue projektiga.
Mees on tegelenud p√µllumajandusega kogu oma elu.
context: "Tegelenud" is the past participle of the Estonian verb "tegeleda", which means to be engaged in, deal with, or work on something. It indicates an ongoing activity that someone was occupied with in the past. The word typically follows a negation (like "mitte tegelenud") or appears as part of compound tenses with auxiliary verbs like "olema" (to be).
